alert.note: Alert for Anson; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 10:29PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Anson and Richmond Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1027 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Sturdivants, or 12 miles southeast of Monroe, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockingham, Wadesboro, Hamlet, Ansonville, Polkton, Ellerbe, Dobbins Heights, Lilesville, Morven and Peachland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
